data.title: U.S. Representative Chellie Pingree
data.meta_description: Chellie Pingree never anticipated a life in politics. Living on the offshore island of North Haven, Maine, she raised her kids and ran a small business.
data.text:
Slow Fashion Caucus to President Biden: ...

This week Congresswoman Chellie Pingree (D-Maine) hosted U.S. Department of Transportation Secretary Pete Buttigieg in Maine for a two-day tour of ongoing infrastructure projects across the First District, highlighting how investments made ...» Read More about Pingree Joins Secretary Buttigieg in Maine on 2-Day Tour of Infrastructure Projects

Pingree Cosponsors Constitutional Amendm...

Maine First District Congresswoman Chellie Pingree is joining a Congressional push to reverse the U.S. Supreme Court’s recent decision to grant presidents immunity from criminal prosecution. The constitutional amendment, introduced and led ...» Read More about Pingree Cosponsors Constitutional Amendment to Prevent Complete Presidential Immunity

Pingree to Skip Netanyahu Address, Citin...

Congresswoman Chellie Pingree (D-Maine) announced she will not attend Israel Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu’s joint address to Congress today, and issued the following statement: “The October 7 attacks on Israel by Hamas terrorists were ...» Read More about Pingree to Skip Netanyahu Address, Citing the Appalling Humanitarian Crisis in Gaza and Long History of Failed Leadership
